source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger wishes to speak with you about the royal return of Good King Moggle Mog XII.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_00<tab>ウリエンジェは、冒険者に善王モグル・モグXII世に関する依頼をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_01<tab>Urianger informs you that the Mogglesguard have once more succeeded in calling forth the daunting avatar of Good King Moggle Mog XII. Make your way to the Adders' Nest in Gridania, and report to High Serpent Commander Vorsaile Heuloix.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_01<tab>ウリエンジェによると、モーグリ家臣団によって「善王モグル・モグXII世」が再召喚されてしまったらしい。グリダニアの双蛇党：統合司令部に向かい、「ボルセル大牙佐」に状況を確認しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_02<tab>In somewhat pained tones, Vorsaile Heuloix explains how Kuplo Kopp attempted to chastise the Mogglesguard for their previous folly in summoning the king. Unfortunately, Kuplo's words did not have the desired effect─fueled by fear and righteous indignation, the Mogglesguard proceeded to summon an even more potent incarnation of their maniacal monarch. Make haste to the Bramble Patch in the East Shroud, and rendezvous with your frantic moogle acquaintance.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_02<tab>ボルセル大牙佐と話した。追い詰められた家臣団が呼んだ「モグル・モグXII世」は、極王として、以前よりも強い力を得ているらしい。東部森林の茨の森で、待機している「クポロ・コップ」と合流しよう。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_03Kuplo Kopp has called upon you to depose “Great” King Moggle Mog XII, and to give the Mogglesguard a sound thrashing. Enter Thornmarch through the nullified ward, and defeat this royal menace!

※Thornmarch (Extreme) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_SEQ_03クポロ・コップと合流し、極王と家臣団へのお仕置きを託された。開かれた結界の中に突入し、「極王モグル・モグXII世」を討伐しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Vorsaile Heuloix at the Adders' Nest.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_TODO_00<tab>双蛇党：統合司令部のボルセル大牙佐と話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Kuplo Kopp in the Bramble Patch.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_TODO_01<tab>茨の森のクポロ・コップと話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_000<tab>Amongst mooglekind, the legend of Good King Moggle Mog XII doth tell of a wise and magnanimous ruler. Alas, the entity thus summoned put the lie to this imagining with his brief and decidedly unpeaceful reign.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_000モーグリ族に語り継がれし、善王モグル・モグXII世……。
優しき王の伝承は……されど、破滅への頁をめくる……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_001<tab>'Twas most disturbing for me to learn, then, that the Mogglesguard have once more succeeded in placing their manic potentate upon his thorny throne...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_001……かの善王が、再召喚されたとの報が入りました。
再び、モーグリ家臣団の手によって……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_002<tab>Only with the Ascians' guileful intervention could they have called the king back from the aether with such haste. I am afeared that, as was the case with Ifrit and his primal ilk, the ritual thus employed hath empowered the avatar with a strength far beyond that of his previous incarnation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_002迅速な再召喚……アシエンの介入は必定……。
強化された蛮神「イフリート」らと同じく、
新たな召喚法を用いた可能性もあります……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_003<tab>Methinks the agents of chaos doth lurk in the shadows of this deed. Only with the Ascians' guileful intervention could they have called the king back from the aether with such haste.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_003騒乱の陰には、闇の使徒あり……。
これほど急な再召喚となれば、
アシエンが関与している可能性は高いと思われます。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_004<tab>As ever, it falls to thee─to the blade born of light─to banish the Paragons' dark ambition from our realm. The Twelve only know what dire power doth corrupt the “savior” of these gentle forest folk...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_004なれば、今回の討伐にも、あなたの力が必要不可欠……。
混沌の闇を打ち払い続けてきた、
「神狩る白き剣」たる……あなたの力が。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_005<tab>Thy name hast been called, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The more moderate faction of the moogles hath joined with the Order of the Twin Adder in an effort to open thee a path to the Good King's domain.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_005再召喚された多くの場合、それは更なる力をつけている……。
……すでに、穏健派のモーグリ族と双蛇党が協力し、
黒衣森で善王討伐の作戦を進めているそうです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_006<tab>I bid thee make haste to the Adders' Nest, and once more pledge thine aid in deposing this royal myth made flesh.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_URIANGER_000_006急ぎ、グリダニアの「双蛇党：統合司令部」へ。
そして、「善王モグル・モグXII世」再討伐に、
あなたの力をお貸しください……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_010<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the Scions)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the Scions)) /var>)) /var>, glad I am to see you. I assume you have been apprised of the situation regarding the moogle monarch?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) (()) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>、待っていたよ。
話は聞いていると思うが、
君に「善王モグル・モグXII世」再討伐の協力を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_011<tab>After your previous deposal of the king, Kuplo Kopp approached the Mogglesguard and attempted to convince them of the error of their ways.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_011……善王を呼び出した「モーグリ家臣団」については、
前回の討伐後、モーグリ族のクポロ・コップ殿が、
説得を試みてくれたんだけどね……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_012<tab>...Unfortunately, it appears his efforts at persuasion had rather the opposite effect. The royal sentries reportedly flew into a frenzy, and focused their righteous indignation into a new summoning ritual.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_012遺憾なことに、説得は失敗……。
逆上した家臣団は、再び善王を呼び寄せたというわけさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_013<tab>Mayhap it was the unwavering intensity of the Mogglesguard's prayers, but the king has returned to the forest enveloped in an almost blinding aura of majesty.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_013しかも、善王が一度討たれたことで、
救世主を求める彼らの祈りは、さらに強くなった。
……そのせいか、善王は力を増しているというんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_014<tab>Kuplo Kopp tells us that this dauntingly maniacal avatar has now taken to calling himself <var 1A 02 /var>Great<var 1A 01 /var> King Moggle Mog XII. Suffice it to say that the Elder Seedseer is willing to condone the necessary act of regicide.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_014クポロ・コップ殿によれば、再び現れた王は、
究極の力を得た「極王」を名乗っているのだとか……。
カヌ・エ様も、さすがに今回ばかりは覚悟したようでね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_015<tab>For the safety of all who dwell within the Twelveswood, it has been decided that the king must fall. A certain member of the Elder Seedseer's personal guard has already escorted Kuplo Kopp to the ward that shields the monarch's domain.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_015そこで、我々は「極王モグル・モグXII世」の討伐を決断。
すでにカヌ・エ様直属の守人により、
クポロ・コップ殿を、結界の結び目へ送り届けた。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_016<tab>Those among us with the ability to see moogles are often in high demand, but, considering the urgency of your mission, our leader felt it best to expedite matters.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_016……双蛇党でも、モーグリ族が視える人材は限られていてね。
それでも、君の負担を減らせるのならと、
カヌ・エ様が計らってくださったのさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_017<tab>Pray make your preparations and set out as soon as you are able. Kuplo Kopp awaits you in the Bramble Patch in the East Shroud.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_017その期待に、どうか応えてほしい。
準備ができ次第、東部森林にある茨の森で、
「クポロ・コップ」殿と合流してくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_019<tab>Though I wish it were otherwise, the unenviable duty of dragging “Great” King Moggle Mog XII from his throne falls to you. Head to the Bramble Patch in the East Shroud, and Kuplo Kopp will open the way to Thornmarch.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_VORSAILE_000_019「極王モグル・モグXII世」の討伐、頼んだよ。
準備ができ次第、東部森林にある茨の森で、
「クポロ・コップ」殿と合流してくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_020<tab>Oh, I knew you'd come! At least, I was hoping, kupo!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_020クポポ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
来てくれて、ありがとうクポ～！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_021<tab>Not long ago, I had a stern word with the Mogglesguard about the dangers of turning pleasant faerie tales into disturbing reality. But they insisted that the intimidating force that is Good King Moggle Mog XII─may his scepter of judgment ever command our respect─is exactly the sort of savior we need.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_021……モグ、あれから家臣団をお説教したクポ。
でも、連中は王さまの力で邪魔者を粛清すると言い張って、
モグの言葉を聞かなかったクポ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_022<tab>The Mogglesguard are afraid, kupo. Afraid of how the forest has changed, afraid of the never-ending conflict, afraid that we moogles have no place in this new world...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_022やっぱり、家臣団も不安なんだクポ。
変わってしまった森に……たくさんの争い……
怖くて、悲しくて、グルグルしてるクポ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_023<tab>I am scared of all those things, too. But the thought of unleashing our royal menace upon the Twelveswood scares me even more, kupo!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_023だけど、王さまが粛清しちゃったら、
この森は、もっと悲しいことでいっぱいになるクポ！
そんなの絶対だめクポ～！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_024<tab>Please, you must deal with them firmly before this goes too far! A measured thrashing, of course─nothing too brutal!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_024もう一度、キミに家臣団と王さまを止めてほしいクポ！
そこの結び目から結界に入って、
わからずやのみんなに、お仕置きクポ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_025<tab>You can enter Thornmarch here, through the tear I've made in the ward. Take care, good fortune, and in the meantime I'll go let the others know that Great King Moggle Mog XII─may his reign end with minimal bloodshed─will be vacating his throne, kupo!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_KUPLOKOPP_000_025モグは、怯えてる仲間たちと、お話ししてくるクポ。
キミがきたから、もう大丈夫だって……話すクポ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_BODYGUARD01412_000_030<tab>Kuplo Kopp has nullified the ward in anticipation of your arrival. I pray this royal nightmare is not beyond your abilities...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD017_01412_BODYGUARD01412_000_030すでに、クポロ・コップ殿によって、結界は開かれています。
恐るべき力を得た「極王モグル・モグXII世」の討伐……
どうか、お気をつけて。
